mapper.select: select cn_user_id as id, cn_user_name as name, cn_user_password as password, cn_user_nick as nick, cn_user_token as token from cn_user where cn_user_name=#{name}
mapper.insert: insert into cn_user( cn_user_id, cn_user_name, cn_user_password, cn_user_token, cn_user_nick )values( #{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{token}, #{nick} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from cn_user where cn_user_id=#{userId}
